schema_version.hidden comment: Bump the default in the subclasses.

step_run.description: Reference to analysis step run in pipeline
step_run.title: Analysis Step

___href.comment: Internal webapp URL for document file

quality_metric_of.description: One or more files that this metric either applies to or is calculated from.
quality_metric_of.title: Files

items.description: A particular file associated with this quality metric.
items.comment: See file.json for a list of available identifiers.
items.title: File

description: Schema for reporting duplicates from 'picard' or 'samtools -c' as a quality metric
title: Read duplicates quality metric

___Unmapped Reads.description: Number of unmapped detected by picard
___Unmapped Reads.title: Unmapped Reads

___UMI Read Duplicates.description: Number of UMI flagged read duplicates
___UMI Read Duplicates.title: UMI Read Duplicates

___Read Duplicates.description: Total number of paired and unpaired read duplicates
___Read Duplicates.title: Read Duplicates

___Read Pairs Examined.description: Number of read pairs examined by picard
___Read Pairs Examined.title: Read Pairs Examined

___Unpaired Read Duplicates.description: Number of unpaired reads detected as duplicates by picard
___Unpaired Read Duplicates.title: Unpaired Read Duplicates

___Percent Duplication.description: Percent of reads that are duplicates
___Percent Duplication.title: Percent Duplication

___Unpaired Reads Examined.description: Number of unpaired reads examined by picard
___Unpaired Reads Examined.title: Unpaired Reads Examined

___Reads Examined.description: Total number of paired and unpaired reads examined
___Reads Examined.title: Reads Examined

___Read Pair Duplicates.description: Number of read pairs detected as duplicates by picard
___Read Pair Duplicates.title: Read Pair Duplicates

___Estimated Library Size.description: Library size in reads as estimated by picard
___Estimated Library Size.title: Estimated Library Size

___Read Pair Optical Duplicates.description: Number of read pairs detected as optical duplicates by picard
___Read Pair Optical Duplicates.title: Read Pair Optical Duplicates
